kind.description: The type of object represented by the document

id.description: A meaningful identifier for the project

eventSubscriptions.description: The events that this project subscribes to

eventSubscription.description: Describes a set of events that the project is subscribed to

source.description: The name of the event source

types.description: Types of events from the source

image.description: A URI for an OCI image

imagePullPolicy.description: Pull policy for the OCI image

command.description: The command to execute within the container

arguments.description: Arguments to the command to execute within the container

environment.description: A map of environment variables and their values

jobPolicies.description: Policies for any job containers the worker container might fan out to

allowPrivileged.description: Whether job containers are permitted to be run as privileged

allowDockerSocketMount.description: Whether job containers are permitted to mount the host's Docker socket

kubernetesJobPolicies.description: Jobs configuration pertaining specifically to Kubernetes

imagePullSecrets.description: Kubernetes secrets that can be used as image pull secrets for job images

kubernetesConfig.description: Worker configuration pertaining specifically to Kubernetes

imagePullSecrets.description: Kubernetes secrets that can be used as image pull secrets for the worker's images

useWorkspace.description: Whether the worker will require a shared workspace for itself and any jobs it spawns

workspaceSize.description: The amount of storage to be provisioned for a worker

logLevel.description: Log level to be observed by the worker

configFilesDirectory.description: A directory relative to the workspace where all configuration files needed by the worker can be located

defaultConfigFiles.description: A map of config file / script contents indexed by filename-- useful for projects that don't utilize any VCS

description.description: A brief description of the project
